title: Will my draft on the Made With Unity website be public after the migration to Unity Connect?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have a profile or story in draft on the Made With Unity site
  • I am concerned that my draft will be made live without my knowledge or permission.

sections.title: Cause
content: Made With Unity is migrating to Unity Connect and all profiles and stories submitted for approval will be made public.

sections.title: Resolution
content: If your content is in draft form on madewith.unity.com it will in remain as a draft when it is migrated to Unity Connect.
